content.rendered: Dilantha joined Regent in 2020 and is based at the Colombo office as an Executive Video Editor. Dilantha boasts 12 Years of Experience in the Sri Lankan Film & Television Industry. He is a creative and resourceful Video Editor and Music Composer with a strong sense of timing and storytelling. He is a highly motivated, focused and committed individual with effective communication skills and the ability to address different individuals of various levels. He acquired his negotiation skills through various working experiences. Skilled in organisation and possesses effective presentation skills. He also has strong professional ethics and a high respect for others.
